name: sa2_p02_selected_medians_and_averages_census_2016
title: SA2-P02 Selected Medians and Averages-Census 2016

legal.licenceType: Creative Commons Attribution 2.5 Australia (CC BY 2.5 AU)

abstract:
SA2 based data for Selected Medians and Averages, in Place of Enumeration Profile (PEP), 2016 Census. The median or average was calculated in the following categories: a person???s age, a person???s income, a family???s income, total household income, mortgage repayment, rental payments, number of persons per bedroom and household size. The data is by SA2 2016 boundaries. Periodicity: 5-Yearly.
For more information visit the data source: http://www.abs.gov.au/census.

selectedAttributes.name: median_tot_prsnl_inc_weekly
selectedAttributes.title: Median total personal income weekly
selectedAttributes.description: The median personal income in dollars per week, applicable to people aged 15 years and over.
